name: Luck of the Roll
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam 153 and The Minus Jam 2020.

Roll dice, and then drag and drop them to either attack or defend. Use potions for their unique effects!

Mouse over potions or different components for additional information.

Defeat the Boss to win! Good luck!

The font used is Charybdis, made by Tepid Monkey Fonts (https://www.1001fonts.com/charybdis-font.html)

The art's color palette is from Brandon James Greer (https://www.instagram.com/p/B30Hib-HJVV/)
Art created in Aseprite (https://www.aseprite.org/)
Sound effects created in Chiptone by SFBGames (https://www.sfbgames.com/chiptone)
